Talk_1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Travelers through these parts say that
they're vicious beasts who used to live
in Taran Pass.
But recently, for some reason, all three
of them came here.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Most of the time they're asleep, but so
much as get near them and they'll wake
up and go berserk.
With them around, nobody can go inside
the caves.
Talk_1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Trouble>Right. Don't offer to help or anything...


Those three caves are mining hot spots
made by the Upheaval.

They drew a lot of travelers here,
to Lakeside Stable.

But with the three giant monster brothers
holing up inside, nobody comes to the
caves anymore.
Talk_1034: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Anything else you want to ask about?
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>For crying out loud...


Of all the places those monsters could
go, they decide to settle down in those
caves? OUR caves?
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wonder if there's some way to chase
them out for the stable's sake.
Talk_1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>They're all up there. One is near
<clr:0000>Corta Lake<clr:ffff>...
Talk_1082:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>It's late. I think I'll head to bed.


I hope I wake up tomorrow and find
out those <clr:0000>three giant monster brothers<clr:ffff>
have left the caves.
Talk_1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>In those caves, there's luminous stone.
I'm talking tons of the stuff, ripe for
the taking!
That's what made them such popular
destinations for travelers around here.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>And then... Well, who could have guessed
that this would happen?
Talk1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're going out in that lightning, you
should put all your metal things away.

Lightning seems to like it here, so
be careful.
Talk_1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Thanks to you, there aren't <clr:0000>three giant
monster brothers <clr:ffff>in the caves. But even
one is too many!
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Until all three of them are gone, guests
won't start coming to the stable again...
Talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What? <sp:5:0:0>What did you just say?


You drove away the monsters, buddy?
Talk_1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>...But the monsters aren't all gone yet.


I'm glad the caves are a little safer,
really I am. <sp:5:0:0>But...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>If even one of those things is still around,
we have no way of knowing which cave it
might sleep in.
Travelers won't be safe in any of them.


You have to drive all of the monsters off,
or this stable will keep losing customers.
Talk1070:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Late nights make for lazy days.


I'm going to head off to sleep.
Talk_1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm...<sp:5:0:0> If the monster rumors spread too
far, it's a safe bet that we'll see fewer and
fewer stable visitors.
If we don't do something, business will
go belly-up!
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Take care where you climb. Don't want to
slip off a cliff.
Talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>Listen up! I've got some great news!


Word has it that those three giant
monster brothers finally left the caves!
Talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>What's that now?


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>You did it?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


You mean...you defeated all three of the
monsters by yourself?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>I've seen enough faces in this job that I
can tell from looking at one if someone's
lying to me.
<snd:Admiration_01>And you...<sp:5:0:0>aren't!


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>I don't even have to go check. You really
did do it! You defeated the monsters!

On behalf of all of us at the stable,
thank you! Please, take this small symbol
of our appreciation.
Talk_1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Though it's hard to see where they are
with this unfortunate weather...
Talk_1090:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sleep>You ugly <clr:0000>three giant monster brothers<clr:ffff>...
Give back our...<clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>... *mumble*
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey there! Thanks for taking care of the
three giant monster brothers.

Have you had a chance to explore the
area around here?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>In this region, there are lots of things
you won't find anywhere else.

My recommendations, you ask? Well,
let me think on that...

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I know you know this, but those <clr:0000>three
caves <clr:ffff>nearby are a miner's dream. You
can get lots of luminous stone from them.
There's also <clr:0000>that animal <clr:ffff>that was
discovered recently.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Those are two special attractions you
won't find anywhere else.
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>...Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Oh! Hello, hello!


I was so deep in thought, I didn't notice
you there.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You didn't happen to, ah...hear what
I was saying, did you?
Talk_1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Though it's hard to see where they are
at this hour...
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You're kidding... Right? Did you forget?


The three caves near Floria Falls, where
you drove out the giant monster brothers.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's lots of luminous stone for the
taking in them, so they're very popular
places for travelers!
LargeHorse: Will that fit in the stable?
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>I guess you did hear.


There are <clr:0000>three caves <clr:ffff>that appeared
around here after the Upheaval.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What? Don't tell me you haven't heard
about it!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>It's practically all anyone can talk about
right now.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>From the stable, cross the river, and
you'll soon see some strange creatures.
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>OK, funny guy! Don't pretend you
weren't listening!

Fine, then. I won't tell you about it.
You can just tell me what's going on in
your life.<sp:5:1:0> OK?
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huge deposits of luminous stone can be
mined in those caves, so they're popular
spots for travelers. <sp:5:0:0>Or, they were.
Then the <clr:0000>three giant monster brothers<clr:ffff>
showed up.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Those three used to be over in Taran Pass
to the northeast, but now they're in our
region, hogging the caves for themselves.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If we don't do something, travelers will
stop coming here, and business at the
stable will dry up!
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I can't win.<sp:5:0:0> It's not as though
they'll up and leave.
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We get a lot of thunderstorms here.
If you're carrying anything metal,
be careful.
You'll be safer inside. When you hear
thunder, find shelter as soon as you can.
Talk1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You heading out somewhere? Be careful.
Around here, rain can kick up without any
warning at all.
Talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>*cough*


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkDeny_00>Uh...


Sheesh, all right. There are <clr:0000>three
caves <clr:ffff>that appeared around here
after the Upheaval.
Talk_1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_01>With those pesky brothers gone at last,
the guests will start pouring back in!

I guess I'd better get back to work, huh?<sp:0:4:0>And, listen, you've got your reward. But
if you ever need luminous stones, feel
free to take all you need from the caves.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>And there are plenty of areas of interest
besides those caves for you to see
around here.
Not to mention rare animals that you can
only find around this stable. Take it easy.
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, buddy. You already went to the
<clr:0000>three caves <clr:ffff>past Floria Falls, right?

Then did you come across <clr:0000>that animal<clr:ffff>
along the way? The one you can only
see near this stable.
Talk_1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>Shoot! Your pouch is full.


I was going to give you a special meal
made with local ingredients.

Come back when you've made some
space, and I'll give it to you. <sp:5:1:0>No rush
at all.
Talk_1062:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_01>As a reward for defeating the three
monster brothers, I was going to give
you a special meal.
If you want a taste of some delicious
local cuisine, then make some room in
your pouch!
Talk_1063:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Oh, it's you! Are you ready for your
reward? <sp:5:1:0>Because your reward is ready
for YOU!
Talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>With <clr:0000>the caves <clr:ffff>occupied by the monsters,
fewer and fewer customers are coming
to the stable.
If only some brave someone would drive
away the <clr:0000>three giant monster brothers<clr:ffff>...
Talk_1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny_00>See that big waterfall? There are three
caves around it.
